title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and chat with 70+ open-source LLMs locally (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, …).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, push models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, retrieval, tool-calling, etc.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, RAG, voice) that talks to any local Ollama instance.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings, tool-calling.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list models.

title: ollama-cli (go)
summary: Community Go CLI with fuzzy model search, chat REPL, and batch benchmarks.

title: ollama-copilot.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that turns Ollama models into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-chatbot (Streamlit)
summary: Minimal Streamlit chatbot that connects to Ollama; includes session memory and model switcher.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Drop-in replacement for OpenAI Codex using Ollama; powers CLI code generation and explanation.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC caching.

title: ollama-sdks (community)
summary: Community-maintained list of unofficial SDKs (C#, Rust, Go, PHP, Dart, Swift) and examples.

title: ollama-rag (Python)
summary: Template repo showing how to build a private RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings and Chroma/Qdrant.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model using slash commands.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama server and CLI; pinned builds for macOS/Linux with CUDA/rocm.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers for CI pipelines to run LLM-based tests or code review.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for summarizing notes, Q&A, and auto-completion.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# SDK targeting .NET 6+ with async enumerable streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Idiomatic Rust crate for Ollama; tokio-based async, streaming, serde models, embed support.
